Tangis Driver Ojol Ini Pecah Saat Pesanan Makanan Rp 200 Ribu Dibatalkan Customer
07 Nov 2019, 06:04 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Foto: istimewa

Jakarta - Peringatan besar bagi para customer ojek online untuk lebih menghargai pekerjaan orang lain. Seorang driver ojol lagi-lagi dirugikan karena pesanannya tiba-tiba dibatalkan. Pengemudi ojol yang diketahui bernama Darto ini mendadak viral setelah videonya beredar luas. Dalam video ini Darto tampak menangis sesenggukan karena orderan makanan yang dipesan customernya mendadak dibatalkan. Pesanan senilai Rp 200.000 tersebut akhirnya tak pernah sampai ke pemesannya. Sementara driver ojol Gojek ini harus menanggung kerugian, padahal Darto saat itu sama sekali tak memegang uang.


Foto: istimewa

Baca juga : Sedih! Driver Ojol Ini Bingung Setelah Tertipu Order Fiktif Rp 663.000Dengan tangis pecah, Darto menceritakan kronologi pesanan yang ia bawa ini. Tapi sayangnya karena ia bercerita sambil menangis, suaranya pun tak jelas. Ia terus menangis sambil memandangi sekardus paket yang diikat di belakang jok motornya. Darto mengatakan sejak pagi ia belum menerima order, ketika siang ada order makanan langsung ia ambil tanpa pikir panjang. Tapi bukannya untung, Darto malah harus menanggung kerugian yang besar karena pesanan dibatalkan tanpa alasan jelas. Video yang diunggah pada (6/11) ini pun menjadi viral di media sosial. Banyak netizen yang mengutuk perbuatan customer seraya mendoakan semoga rezeki driver ojol ini mengalir lancar. Tak sedikit juga yang melontarkan niatan untuk membantu sang driver ojol ini.


Foto: istimewa

"Semoga Allah luas dan lapangkan rezeki bapak ojol itu, dan untuk customer nya semoga allah balas juga atas perilakunya itu," ujar netizen."Kenapa siih manusia jaman sekarang masih ada aja yg hati nya gak layak dipake""Semangat buat bapak nya,, mungkin belom rezeki ya pak, saya juga ojol pak, buat bapak tetap semangat, salam satu aspal." sahut netizen yang juga sama-sama driver ojol. The Ojol Driver Cries When The Food Order Is Rp. 200,000 Canceled by the Customer
Nov 7 2019, 06:04 by Devi Setya - detikFood


Photo: special

Jakarta - A big warning for online motorcycle taxi customers to better appreciate the work of others. An ojol driver was again harmed because his order was suddenly canceled. The ojol driver known as Darto suddenly got viral after the video was widely circulated. In this video Darto seems to cry uncontrollably because the food orders ordered by his customers were suddenly canceled. The Rp 200,000 order finally never arrived at the order. While this ojol Gojek driver had to bear the loss, even though Darto at that time did not hold any money.


Photo: special

Also read: Sad! This Ojol Driver Is Confused After Being Fooled by a False Order of Rp. 663,000 With tears in his eyes, Darto tells the chronology of the order he brought. But unfortunately because he was telling stories while crying, his voice was not clear. He continued to cry while staring at a cardboard package tied to the back of his motorcycle seat. Darto said that since the morning he had not received an order, when there was an order for food he immediately took it without thinking. But instead of making a profit, Darto instead had to bear huge losses because the order was canceled without apparent reason. The video uploaded on (6/11) has also become viral on social media. Many netizens are condemning the customer's actions while praying for this ojol driver's luck to flow smoothly. Not a few also expressed intentions to help the driver of this ojol.


Photo: special

"May Allah be broad and broaden the fortune of the father of the ojol, and for his customers may God also respond to his behavior," said netizens. may not have sustenance sir, I also ojol sir, for you to keep the spirit, greetings one asphalt. " said netizens who are also both ojol drivers. Also read: Many times Order Food Will Not Pay, This Woman Is Hit by Ojol Drivers
